message.content:
cs.GR, cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.NA, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with physically-based animation of smoke, which is a topic related to computer graphics (cs.GR). The algorithm presented involves optimization techniques and PDEs, which are commonly used in computer vision (cs.CV) and multimedia (cs.MM) research. The use of a novel spacetime full approximation scheme (STFAS) suggests that the paper may also be relevant to numerical analysis (cs.NA). Finally, the paper presents a new approach to controlling smoke animation, which could be considered a form of robotics or control systems research (cs.SI).
